headingDesc: Water, power, community and commerce. We keep things flowing.
subHeadingDesc: From massive buildings to studio apartments!
myProfileDesctxt: It is critical that we have your right details to continue providing you with our best possible service. Kindly use this to update us, should you need to make any more changes.
phoneNumberlblDesctxt: If you include more than one number, then we will use the first one to send you SMS alerts and service updates; please make sure it is a local mobile.
preferredLanglbltxt: Which language you would prefer us to use?
